name: Santa and Mrs.
description: Santa and Mrs. are very easy and fun to knit.
full_text: Santa and Mrs. are very easy and fun to knit. They make great toys or Christmas decorations. Finished size is approximately 8 inches. The size can be adjusted by using smaller or larger needles and/or yarn. Gauge is not important and they are knitted flat with straight needles. The models were done with size 5 or 3.75mm needles using worsted yarn. The skill level is a basic knowledge of knitting.
